mapper.select: SELECT RNO ,WRITER ,CONTENTS ,BNO_GROUP ,STEP ,SPACING ,INSERT_DATE ,UPDATE_DATE FROM REPLY WHERE BNO_GROUP = #{bnoGroup} ORDER BY STEP, RNO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( RNO ,WRITER ,CONTENTS ,BNO_GROUP ,STEP ,SPACING ) VALUES ( (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(RNO),0) FROM REPLY R) ,#{writer} ,#{bnoGroup} ,#{step} + 1 ,#{spacing} + 1 )
